title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When using the 'Import Project' feature, the application does not automatically suggest or remember the last folder used for importing a project.
EB: The expected behavior is that the 'Import Project' feature should have a default folder pre-selected, preferably remembering the last folder used for importing a project.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the 'Import Project' feature.
3. Observe that there is no default folder pre-selected.
4. Manually select a folder to import a project.
5. Close the application and reopen it.
6. Repeat steps 1-4 and observe if the application remembers the last folder used for importing.
